name: Warning! Crash Landing is Prohibited
description: THIS GAME WAS MADE FOR THE FIRST EDITION OF NUMPAD JAM. EVEN THOUGH THE JAM WAS MADE BY ME, I PARTICIPATED THERE TO MOTIVATE OTHERS. I ALWAYS WANTED TO MAKE A 3D FLAPPY BIRD TYPE OF GAME SO I GRABBED THIS OPPORTUNITY TO MAKE ONE. THE THEME FOR THE JAM WAS BASED ON TRUE STORY. SO I TOOK THE INSPIRATION FROM THESTORIES OF WORLD WAR 2. YOU ARE STUCK IN THE FOREST WITH YOU PLANE'S ENGINE FAILED. ALL YOU HAVE TO DO IS AS THE NAME SUGGESTS, NOT CRASH BEFORE YOU REACH YOUR HOMELAND. ALSO YOU CANNOT FLY TO HIGH TO SAVE YOUR FUEL. BUT BEFORE YOU REACH YOUR HOMELAND, YOU NEED TO CROSS ALMOST 100 KM OF FOREST. GOOD LUCK CAUSE YOU WILL NEED IT. ADDITIONAL MISSION PERFORMED WAS "WITTY COMMENTS".
